MimicSpawnAmountMin.Description: Minimum number of Mimics that can spawn at the star of the match

MimicSpawnAmountMax.Description: Maximum number of Mimics that can spawn during a match, -1 meaning infinite

MimicSpawnLimit.Description: Maximum number of Mimics that can be present at one time

MimicTimeToRespawn.Description: minimum time in seconds between the start of MrMarch destruction to respawn

MimicDestructionTime.Description: time in seconds from the start of mimic destruction to end (to give time to cosmetics)

SnowballInteractTimeSlasher.Description: Interaction time with a Snowpile to grab a Snowball for Killers

SnowballInteractTimeCamper.Description: Interaction time with a Snowpile to grab a Snowball for Campers

SnowmanPosessionVignetteDuration.Description: time delay in seconds of when the despawn animation plays afer the spawn animation for vignette

SnowballThrowDelaySurvivorFemale.Description: delay in seconds between player input and snowball launch. does not contribute to cooldown

SnowballThrowDelaySurvivorMale.Description: delay in seconds between player input and snowball launch. does not contribute to cooldown

SnowballThrowDelaySurvivorKiller.Description: delay in seconds between player input and snowball launch. does not contribute to cooldown
